      • processConnection

        private void processConnection()
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Gets input from the client and calls the findFile method
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findFile

        private boolean findFile(java.lang.String message)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Looks for a file at the specified file path. If the file exists, the contents are sent. If not, the client is informed that the path does not exist.
        Parameters:
        message - file path
        Returns:
        True when client terminates, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • terminate

        private void terminate()
        Closes streams and sockets
